id.description: The unique identifier for this mission, beginning with the phase number

description.description: Description of what is covered in this mission

welcome.description: Text displayed at start of mission

name.description: Name of this vessel, 'Ownship' for player's vessel

force.description: Which force this vessel belongs to

unableToPerformRanging.description: Whether this vessel is capable of performing ranging manoeuvres

behaviours.description: List of behaviours exhibited by this vessel

sonars.description: List of sonars carried by this vessel

offset.description: Distance from centre of ownship back to centre of towed array (m)

DT.description: Detection threshold - the minimum SNR required to make detection

speedPattern.description: How the noise increases with speed

time.description: Time at which this state is valid (secs)

height.description: Altitude of this vessel (-ve for underwater) (m)

patrolArea.description: Rough bounds of area for this operation

items.description: Series of x/y coordinates representing rectangle

objectives.description: Elements that watch the scenario unfold, including success/failure tests

oneOf.description: allow a second tier of objectives

features.description: Collection of geographic features to draw on the Map control

hidePoint.description: whether to hide the marker icon at this point

featurePolygon.description: A series of ring objects, the first one plotted as the polygon

behaviourName.description: Unique name for this instance of this behaviour

behaviourHeight.description: Height (or -ve for depth) to travel at in assorted behaviours

speed.description: How fast to travel along this path (previous speed restored afterwards)

repeat.description: Once this PATH behaviour is complete, should we repeat the steps in reverse order

forever.description: Once this PATH behaviour is complete, shall we just continue looping through the points?

behaviourRectangleWander.description: Wander around area. When edge of rectangle is reached, set demanded course to bearing to centre of area.

tl.description: Co-ords of top-left corner of patrol area

behaviourSnort.description: When battery reaches danger level, snort until safe level

height.description: Height (-ve depth) to travel at for snort

startLevel.description: Battery level at which snorting will start

stopLevel.description: Battery level at which snorting will be complete

behaviourEvade.description: Vessel will turn away when specified target is detected

behaviourAttack.description: Vessel will face towards named target, for as long as it is detected

objectiveAchievement.description: Award the player with an achievement

name.description: Name of this achievement. Icon name is inferred from this

objectiveFindTarget.description: Player must select the indicated sonar track

objectiveDistanceToCategory.description: Fail if the subject gets within specified distance of specified category of vesssels

objectiveDistanceFromCategory.description: Failure if subject passes outside specified range of named category of vessel

objectiveStayInArea.description: Failure if subject vessel passes outside specified rectangular bounds

objectiveSuccessOnLine.description: Success if subject vessel passes close to the line

objectiveSuccessInArea.description: Success if subject vessel passes into specified rectangular bounds

objectiveProximity.description: Subject vessel must pass within specified range target within specified time, potentially at indicated course and speed

objectiveGainContact.description: Subject vessel must gain contact with specified target within elapsed time

objectiveMaintainContact.description: Subject vessel must stay in continuous contact with target for specified period

objectiveObtainSolution.description: Player must achieve specified number of solutions, at specified accuracy

objectiveDistance.description: Subject vessel must stay outside specified distance of target

objectiveDestroyTarget.description: Subject vessel must destroy named target within time limit

objectiveElapsed.description: Game must continue for specified time period
